name: bootstrapd
body:
### Bootstrapd is a community gathering for software craftspeople who are---or aspire to be---building and selling their own products.

We don't want VC funding, we aren't looking for a big exit; we want to create a sustainable living enjoying our craft.

###When and Where?

Join us for a full day of open space on Wednesday June 27th at [Abden House, Edinburgh, UK](http://lanyrd.com/venues/edinburgh/vrrz/)

###Registration

Tickets cost £75. [Click here to register.](http://bootstrapd.eventbrite.co.uk/)

###Who's Behind All This?

Bootstrapd is organised by [@mattwynne](http://twitter.com/mattwynne) and [@tooky](http://twitter.com/tooky). Bootstrapd is a not for profit event, and any surplus revenue will go behind the bar in the evening.
tagline: Boot·strapping - a self-sustaining process that proceeds without external help.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
